name: migration-team
description: Framework and library migration with phased analysis-then-transformation workflow. Analyzer is read-only; transformers make atomic, individually revertable changes.

members.name: migration-coordinator
members.description: Plans migration strategy, defines transformation scope and ordering, tracks progress across all workers, resolves conflicts when multiple transformers touch related files, and ensures the migration maintains a working state at each step.

members.name: compatibility-analyzer
members.description: Identifies all deprecated API usage, maps old patterns to new equivalents, catalogs breaking changes, and produces a migration manifest listing every required transformation with file locations and severity. Read-only: analyzes but never modifies code.

members.name: code-transformer
members.description: Performs source code transformations based on the migration manifest. Updates import paths, API call signatures, component patterns, and type definitions. Each transformation is atomic and individually revertable.

members.name: test-updater
members.description: Updates test files to match migrated source code. Fixes broken imports, updates mocking patterns, replaces deprecated test utilities, and ensures test coverage is maintained or improved after migration.

members.name: config-migrator
members.description: Updates build configuration, package dependencies, tooling config (ESLint, Prettier, TSConfig), CI/CD pipelines, and environment setup. Handles version bumps, new required dependencies, and removed deprecated packages.
